remarks: A version of ~ eqrelrdv2 with explicit non-free declarations. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Aug-2017.)
statement:
eqrelrd2.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
eqrelrd2.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
eqrelrd2.3 $e |- F/_ x A $.
eqrelrd2.4 $e |- F/_ y A $.
eqrelrd2.5 $e |- F/_ x B $.
eqrelrd2.6 $e |- F/_ y B $.
eqrelrd2.7 $e |- ( ph -> ( <. x , y >. e. A <-> <. x , y >. e. B ) ) $.
eqrelrd2 $p |- ( ( ( Rel A /\ Rel B ) /\ ph ) -> A = B ) $.
$d x y $.
